N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2054.5 - Board approval for procurement contracts

State Regulations

All procurement contracts involving services to be rendered
over more than 12 months shall be approved in advance by the board of
directors, and performance under such contracts shall be reviewed annually by
the board of directors. In addition, any procurement contract shall be approved
by the board of directors if it is likely to result in total payments to the
outside contractor in excess of $50,000 per year and is not in the ordinary
course of the corporation's business of maintaining, managing and operating the
properties of the corporation. Notes
